Title: Ancient Curiosity: Utility
Description: <You hold the relic and discover a shimmering glow emanating from it. This looks important. The Explorers' League would be interested in this.>
ObjectivesText: Use and equip Streamlined Relic to Brann Bronzebeard.

Objectives.Text: Add the Streamlined Relic to your collection
Equip the Streamlined Relic to your companion
